body: If it's not too late, yes @Erukiin you had like many others read an English version off it. Sadly, it's no longer up on common reading sites. TD;DR Horieros is on fakku, so you know what that means, that also goes to all of you

See a bunch of tags I like... looks decent >group... scroll down to an obvious untagged ntr for 3rd story....faggots at e still dont know how to tag, huh? At least some of these are clearly unrelated. Hopefully they'll get properly split when TL'd.

I've read the sister that claimed to be a succubus somewhere. It was translated too. I could've sworn I read it but I can't seem to find it anymore. Not in hentai2read nor hitomi. Or maybe I read it here in nhentai. It's bugging me so much that I can't find it even though I swear I read it somewhere before
Good Lord Horieros always so good

fap fap fap fap 1000x
I'm satisfied but want more.
